name: Lume (itch) (Lexie Mason-Davis)
description:
A group project done for Independent Study credit during the Spring 2014 term.

Very very buggy and really just something to learn how to use the software. Windows only.

Credits:

Lexie Mason-Davis: Art Direction, Art Assets, Design, Programming

Tegan Valo: Programming

Taylor Orendurff: Art Assets, Design, Animation, Concept

Sonya Neunzert: Art Assets, Animation
